description: A network of caves in the hills beyond the forest. Few villagers venture this far, telling tales of strange echoes and mysterious lights.
name: Shadow Caves

bat_cave.description: The ceiling here is high and lost in shadow. The air is filled with the leathery flapping of wings and high-pitched squeaks. A thick layer of guano covers the floor.
bat_cave.name: Bat Cave

cave_entrance.description: A dark opening in the hillside marks the entrance to the caves. Cool, damp air flows out. Moss grows around the entrance, and you can hear water dripping somewhere inside.
cave_entrance.name: Cave Entrance

collapsed_tunnel.description: This section of the mine has suffered a major cave-in. Massive rocks and splintered beams block the way further west. Dust hangs heavy in the air.
collapsed_tunnel.name: Collapsed Tunnel

crystal_antechamber.description: The rough stone walls here begin to glitter with small, embedded crystals, catching and reflecting your light. A larger, more brilliant chamber lies to the east.
crystal_antechamber.name: Crystal Antechamber

crystal_chamber.description: This chamber is filled with crystalline formations that glow with a faint inner light. The crystals vary in color from clear to amethyst, creating an otherworldly beauty.
crystal_chamber.name: Crystal Chamber

deep_tunnel.description: This rough-hewn tunnel slopes steeply downwards into the earth. The air grows colder, and the silence is profound. Loose scree makes the footing treacherous.
deep_tunnel.name: Deep Tunnel

east_mine_tunnel.description: An old mining tunnel heading east. It appears stable but unused for a very long time.
east_mine_tunnel.name: East Mine Tunnel

flooded_passage.description: Submerged in icy water, this passage connects the pool to deeper parts of the cave. You must hold your breath. Strange phosphorescent fungi provide a dim, eerie light.
flooded_passage.name: Flooded Passage

forgotten_mine_shaft.description: A vertical mine shaft plunges into darkness below and ascends into blackness above. A rickety ladder is bolted to the wall. Tunnels lead east and west.
forgotten_mine_shaft.name: Forgotten Mine Shaft

geode_cluster.description: Several large, cracked-open geodes line the walls of this small alcove. Their hollow interiors sparkle with thousands of tiny crystals.
geode_cluster.name: Geode Cluster

hidden_ledge.description: You surface from the flooded chamber onto a narrow, hidden ledge. It seems to be part of a larger cavern system you haven't seen before.
hidden_ledge.name: Hidden Ledge

hidden_passage.description: This narrow passage seems intentionally constructed, connecting the old mine to something even older. It smells of dust and ancient decay.
hidden_passage.name: Hidden Passage

lava_tube.description: A smooth, cylindrical tunnel formed by ancient lava flows. The air is still and surprisingly warm.
lava_tube.name: Lava Tube

lava_tube_entrance.description: The rock here changes, becoming darker and smoother. A cylindrical tunnel leads deeper east into what looks like an ancient lava tube.
lava_tube_entrance.name: Lava Tube Entrance

main_cavern.description: A large, open space within the cave system. Stalactites hang from the ceiling, and the ground is uneven. Passages lead north and east, while a rough-hewn tunnel slopes steeply down.
main_cavern.name: Main Cavern

mine_entrance.description: The natural tunnel opens into a worked passage supported by rotting wooden beams. The air smells of dust and decay. This appears to be an old, forgotten mine.
mine_entrance.name: Mine Entrance

mine_exit.description: A collapsed tunnel exit, now just a small hole leading out onto a windswept mountainside.
mine_exit.name: Mine Exit

mine_lower_level.description: You are at the bottom of the main shaft. The air is stale and heavy. A large gold nugget glints from a crack in the wall.
mine_lower_level.name: Mine - Lower Level

mine_upper_level.description: This level of the mine is high and drafty. A rickety wooden platform overlooks the main shaft. The tunnel continues north towards what looks like an exit to the high peaks.
mine_upper_level.name: Mine - Upper Level

narrow_passage.description: A tight corridor that winds between stone walls. The passage feels claustrophobic, and the air is stale. You can hear the squeaking of bats from a passage to the west.
narrow_passage.name: Narrow Passage

submerged_chamber.description: This small air pocket within the flooded passage offers a brief respite. Water drips constantly, and the air is thick with moisture. More glowing fungi cling to the walls.
submerged_chamber.name: Submerged Chamber

underground_pool.description: The passage opens into a chamber with a still, dark pool of water. The surface is like a mirror, reflecting the stone ceiling. The chamber is eerily quiet.
underground_pool.name: Underground Pool

west_mine_tunnel.description: This tunnel feels different from the others, with smoother walls and strange, faint carvings. A faint, cold draft comes from a hidden passage to the northwest.
west_mine_tunnel.name: West Mine Tunnel
